unnormalised: When providing address for delivery, always remember the PIN code! Sending a package to "10, Park Street, Kolkata" is incomplete without the postal code, like 700016. Similarly, just saying "Near AIIMS, Delhi" isn't enough; include the full address and the pin code, e.g., "Ansari Nagar, AIIMS, New Delhi, Delhi 110029." Double-check the format your courier service requires, and you can usually find the correct PIN code online using a partial address.
normalised: When providing address for delivery, always remember the P-I-N code! Sending a package to "ten, Park Street, Kolkata" is incomplete without the postal code, like seven double zero zero one six. Similarly, just saying "Near A-I-I-M-S, Delhi" isn't enough; include the full address and the pin code, e.g., "Ansari Nagar, A-I-I-M-S, New Delhi, Delhi one one zero zero two nine." Double-check the format your courier service requires, and you can usually find the correct P-I-N code online using a partial address.
